column2: a letter]] to J.L.N. O'Loughlin'''.<ref name=CG>{{CG

column1: *'''Subject:''' Tolkien will likely have no vacations in the near future, since he is organizing courses for Navy and Air Force cadets.<ref name=CG/>
*'''Publication:''' A description of the letter appeared in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide
column2: The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]''.
